title: FS: T206 Marquard "Reverse Comma" PSA 3 and Speaker PSA 1.5
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Marquard "Reverse Comma" PSA 3 and Speaker PSA 1.5
posts.post_content:
Fellow Net54ers,

I have a Marquard with uniform lettering "reverse comma" variation. This is an interesting printing anomaly where the period between the N and Y is formed as a reverse comma. $615 delivered USPS with signature confirmation.

I also have a Speaker that has very nice color and great centering. The grade is due to spot paper loss/damage on the reverse. **SOLD**

Please feel free to contact me with any questions. Thanks for the interest.
